actionsandpool.action

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • actionsandpool.action.Action
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ForseeableAction, ResourcePoolAction, Scheduler

    public abstract class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    An Action is an object that can progress in time with a determined number of steps from a ready state to a finished state. A started action is in current state named in progress.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Action.ActionState
      Enum ActionState that represent the different state of an action
